title: Huawei Talkband B3 Lite
description: Original Huawei TalkBand B3 Lite Smart Wristband Bluetooth Headset Answer/End Call Run Walk Sleep Auto Track Support Android and iOS.Friendly Tips/Disclaimer: 1. So far as we test, band screen supports 9 languages(regions) setting in Android/iOS, they're Chinese(China), English(United States/United Kingdom), Russian(Russia), Spanish(Spain),Japanese(Japan), French(France), German(Germany), Italian(Italy), Portuguese(Portugal).2. Other languages(regions) device screen shows defaultly English but APP suports multi-languages.3. the Language of the band is automatically set to the language of your phone( if the language is compatible ), If you use Android phone, only have to change phone language to these 9 languages, then connect the band. If you use Iphone, you have to change the phone language and change the region to the language speaking country.4. The screen of this device is not a touch screen. Can only operate through the side button.Pairing and connect the phone.For the first time use please download and install "Huawei Wear" APP from Huawei App / Google Play store.Android mobile phone please download Huawei Wear app 21.0.0.356 and above; iOS mobile phone please download Huawei Wear app 21.0.9 and above.View the Bluetooth name on the bracelet:When the first use, the band screen will display the band Bluetooth name "HUAWEI B3 Lite-XXX", You can click on the Side button to switch the screen to viewOpen Huawei Wear app.In the list of devices, select the Smart band> Huawei B3 lite.In the Bluetooth name list, click the band Bluetooth name HUAWEI B3 Lite-XXX. Mobile phone pops up Pairing success.Note:Please use Android 4.4 and above, or iOS 8+ mobile phones.Pairing process, the phone pops up permission application, please choose "allow".Please Pairing with your phone in HUAWEI Wear app. If you use Bluetooth pairing in your phone settings, you can only use Bluetooth calls, and can not sync data with HUAWEI app.Functions: conversation via BluetoothAnswer/Hang up callMissed calls inform/callbackSupport answer call / call up / Incoming call alert/ crank call recognition from 2 phones ( the phone's OS should be EMUI 4.0 or above).message reminding/ content display ( need the phone's OS is Android 4.4 or above)Music play via Bluetooth, Sport detect ( Identify automatically the status of walking , running )Sport target setting, sedentary reminder, Calorie count, sleep monitoring, smart alarm clock, time display, looking for phone, call reminder even the phone is in silent mode ( need the phone's OS is EMUI 4.1 or above)Compatibility: Android 4.4 or above, iOS 8.0 or aboveMaterial: High strength composite fiber plastics ( main body holder); TPU ( strap).Battery: 91mAhBluetooth: BT4.2,2.4GHzTransfer range: 10mCharging port: micro USBWorking time: about 3.5 daysConversation Time: about 6 hoursCharging time: about 2 hoursStandby time: about 7 daysROM: 16MB Flash ( external) , 512KB Flash ( Internal)RAM: 128KBWaterproof: IP57Sensors: accelerometer, Hall sensor Size (without strap):61.3mm×21.4mm×13.8 mmWeight: about 30gScreen: 0.91 inch OLED, non-touch screenScreen resolution: 128*32

title: Huawei B593s 22 4G Router
description: Huawei B593 4G LTE CPE Router is world's first 4G LTE TDD FDD Broadband CPE Router. It's launched to market by Sweden operator Tele 2, and HUAWEI B593 4G LTE Router also have many branch models such as HUAWEI B593U-12, B593s-82, B593s-42, B593u-501, B593u-513, B593u-91, B593s-601 etc. They are born to meet the 4G LTE Band requirements for different markets. They incorporates similar configuration and have even same functions. 4G LTE CPE HUAWEI B593 Router is the first LTE TDD wireless broadband router of the world, supports LTE TDD/FDD 800/1800/2300/2600MHz, up to 100Mmbs download speed and access to up to 32 WIFI devices that become an ideal home entertainment and information exchange hub.It supports multi-devices simultaneous high speed access, perfect for SOHO's and small businesses with its connectivity options of the world. Frequencies: * 2G: EDGE/GPRS/GSM 850/900/1800/1900 MHz * 3G HSUPA / HSDPA / UMTS / DC-HSPA+ 900/2100 MHz * LTE FDD Band 1/3/7/8/20 (800/900/1800/2100/2600MHz) and TDD Band 38 (2600MHz), LTE Category 4 CPE (Speed up to 150Mbps) Features: PORTS:* 4 x LAN* 2 x USB Transmission speed 4G (MAX)* Download 100 Mbit / s* upload 50 Mbit / s TRANSMISSION SPEED 3G (MAX)* download 42.2 Mbit / s* upload 5.76 Mbit / s WI-FI: Wi-Fi(802.11 b / g / n) Addistional antenna location: two antenna ports SIZE: 190 mm x 35 mm x 176 mm WEIGHT: 500g Operation systems it's compatible with: * Windows 2000/ Windows XP/ Windows Vista/ Windows 7* Mac OS 10.5/ Mac OS 10.6/ Mac OS 10.7* Linux Application Instroduction:1. Insert the SIM card into the SIM card slot.2. Connect the power cord to the modem and the wall socket.3. Turn on your computer and any other devices modem LAN and USB ports.4. Turn on your modem POWER button. CONNECTING PC TO THE MODEM WLAN CONNECTION1. Turn on your modem POWER button.2. Make an indicator that the WLAN is enabled. To activate the WLAN feature on and off by holding the WLAN button for more than 3 seconds.3. Select your network from the list of wireless networks, the SSID name is the same as the name of your modem and press connect. Enter the network security key. Note: * The SSID and network security key can be found on the label on the back of the modem. * You can review and change the WLAN security settings for the network-management page under General Settings> WLAN Settings > Security. 4. If the PIN code request is active, log network management page and enter the correct PIN code in the field provided. Network Management Page Opening1. Make sure that your flash drive and a computer or device the connection is established correctly.2. Start a web browser and enter the address 192.168.1.13. If the PIN code request is active, asking the network management side of it. The default PIN is 0000. Light Indicators:light Mode light DescriptionMODE Blue This light is a constant blue, when the modem is connected to the 4G network, but no data is transferred. The indicator light flashes blue when data is being transferred.MODE Green This indicator light is constantly green when the modem is connected to a 3G network, but no data is transferred. The indicator light flashes Green when data is being transferred.MODE Orange This light is constantly orange when the modem is connected to a 2G network, but no data is transferred. The indicator light flashes orange when data is being transferred.MODE White This light will flash white when the modem to connect to the wireless network.MODE Red This light is constantly red when the modem cannot connect to a wireless network or modem is not a wireless network.MODE Mulberry This light is on when the SIM card is not recognized, or PIN has not been or PIN authentication fails.WLAN On WLAN function is enabled.LAN1-LAN4 On This light is on when the computer or other device is connected to the LAN port.SIGNAL On More bars are lit, the stronger the wireless signal. Package including :1 x HUAWEI B593s-221 x Power Adapter2 x 4G Antenna

Housing එක මාරුකරන්නේ එම දුරකතනය භාවිතයට නුසුදුසු මට්ටමේ පවතින නිසා.එමනිසා ඔබ දුරකතනයක් මිලදී ගැනීමෙදී Original Housing එකක් සහිත දුරකතනයක් මිලදී ගන්න.අපි ලග තියන Phone වල තියෙන්නේ Phone එකට එන 100% Original Housing එකමය. අඩු මුදලට දෙන හවුසිම් ගැසු, Repair කරන ලද දුරකථන වලට නොරැවටෙන්න.අදම call කරලා වගකීමක් සහිතව අපෙන් Phone එකක් ගන්න.Visit Our FaceBook page for more information...(Phone City)...

description: Credit Cards Accepted!Lowepro is The Trusted Original and photographers have relied on their products since 1967. These photographers, professional and amateaur alike, carry Lowepro bags all over the world—in every kind of climate and in every kind of condition—and rely on the inventive designs to provide protection, accessibility, comfort and durability they can trust.The Pro RunnerTM 350 AW DSLR backpack delivers a compact, streamlined and urban-inspired solution for pro photographers and photojournalists who carry their gear through crowded airports and busy city streets. This feature-filled design fits a DSLR with attached lens, laptop, tripod and multiple accessories, plus a few personal items, in a highly organized pack. From its fully padded interior to it’s patented, built-in All Weather AW CoverTM, the Pro Runner 350 AW thoroughly safeguards valuable gear. Includes: side compression straps with quick-release buckles; a Hideaway Tripod MountTM system; rainflap lids; SlipLockTM attachment loops; mesh side pockets; discreet front pocket accommodates a light jacket, cell phone or MP3 player; memory card pockets on inside lid; padded mesh backpad; thickly padded shoulder straps with 5 adjustment points; padded waistbelt; webbing grab handle; zippered document pocket.Box ContainsLowepro Pro Runner 350AW Camera Backpack

Supports Real-time Display of Battery Remaining CapacityYN686EX-RT supports real-time display of battery remaining capacity,which helps you learn the battery status easily. Compatible with Canon’s 2.4G Radio Transmission (RT) systemIn shooting with 2.4G radio transmission wireless flash,one YN686EX-RT can be used as master unit to trigger YONGNUO and Canon’s RT series speedlite,and remotely control the flash mode and output level of the slave speedlite;One YN686EX-RT can be used as the slave unit,to receive the radio trigger signal from the RT series speedlite and flash trigger of YONGNUO and Canon,to achieve off-camera TTL、M、Multi functions and Gr grouping flash. Supports Canon’s Optical Wireless Master Control FlashIn shooting with optical transmission wireless flash ,YN686EX-RT can be used as master unit to trigger YONGNUO EX speedlites (except for YN585EX)and Canon EX series speedlites, and realize wireless TTL/M/MULTI flash. Supports Optical Wireless Slave FlashCompatible with optical wireless control signal of YONGNUO,Canon and Nikon,supports S1 and S2 preflash cancel trigger mode. High Guide Number, High-speed Sync functionGN60@ISO100,200mm,supports TTL, M, MULTI and Gr flash, the maximum sync shutter speed is up to 1/8000s. Supports Auto-save Setting, Custom Functions Setting(Fn) Equipped with large dot-matrix LCD screen.
